page.title: 17INKPEN - PERSONAL STATISTICS
page.content: At our school, various measurements were taken and averages were found for each age group. They may show growth patterns for l985! Key - H = Height; W = Weight; Ha = Handspan; C = Crown and Wa = Waist. ll Years: H = lm 4l.3cm; W =33.7kg; Ha =l7.4cm; C = 55.5cm and Wa = 68.6cm. lO Years: H = lm 40.lcm; W = 35kg; Ha = l7.3cm: C = 55.7cm and Wa =67.5cm. 9 Years: H = lm 32.lcm; W = 33kg; Ha = l8 cm; C = 54 cm and Wa = 6lcm. 8 Years: H = lm 26.5cm; W = 29.2kg; Ha = l6.7cm; C = 53.3 and Wa = 57.6cm. 7 Years = H = lm 23.7cm; W = 23.6kg; Ha = l5.2cm; C = 52.6 cm and Wa = 54.3cm.
